headline.main: LATEST INTELLIGENCE; By Telegraph to the New-York Daily Times. Maine Election. Great Whig and Democratic Demonstrations in Baltimore. Congressional Nomination--The Pomological Congress. Southern Rights Convention. Anti-Maine Law Outrages. Items from the South. Severe Gale on Lake Erie--Disasters, &c.--The Health of Buffalo. Wreck of the Propeller James Wood on Lake Erie. Two Bodies from the Wreck of the Atlantic, &e. Robbery of a Mail Bag. The Canal Board. Cassius M. Clay--Illnes of Hon. Benj. Hardin. Fatal Accident. Navigation of the Ohio, & c. Military Visits.

docs.lead_paragraph: The following is the vote of Portland for Governor: JOHN HUBBARD, (Dem.,) 1,432; WILLIAM G. CROSBY, (Whig,) 712; ANSON G. CHANDLER, (Independent,) 755; Scattering, 41. The Islands not heard from will give HUBBARD about 40 more votes.
docs.abstract: Recommends Southern Rights candidate to be nominated
docs.snippet: The following is the vote of Portland for Governor: JOHN HUBBARD, (Dem.,) 1,432; WILLIAM G. CROSBY, (Whig,) 712; ANSON G. CHANDLER, (Independent,) 755; Scattering, 41. The Islands not heard from will give HUBBARD about 40 more votes.

headline.main: THE HIGHLANDS.; West Point in its True Point of View--The Movements of General Scott.

docs.lead_paragraph: Of the numerous travelling resorts none possess a more permanent and decided interest than West Point. Its bold and commanding scenery, its invigorating mountain breezes, and the martial spirit of the place, recommend it; at all times, to the favor of the travelling public, who are in quest of health, novelty and recreation.

byline.original: Correspondence of the New-York Daily Times

docs.lead_paragraph: The cholera in Buffalo is thus commented on by the Republic: " We have at length the official report of the Board of Health for the month of August, giving the number of deaths as well as the diseases of which they died.
docs.snippet: The cholera in Buffalo is thus commented on by the Republic: " We have at length the official report of the Board of Health for the month of August, giving the number of deaths as well as the diseases of which they died.

headline.main: THE ISTHMUS.; Business--Naval--Health of the Isthmus.

docs.lead_paragraph: Business here at present is very dull, and I have nothing specially new to report which you will not find in our newspapers. The U. S. sloop-of-war Portsmouth, Captain DORNIN, men and officers all well, left the 27th of July.
docs.snippet: Business here at present is very dull, and I have nothing specially new to report which you will not find in our newspapers. The U. S. sloop-of-war Portsmouth, Captain DORNIN, men and officers all well, left the 27th of July.

byline.original: Correspondence of the New-york Daily Times

docs.lead_paragraph: FROM SANTA FE.--Several persons from the Plains arrived last night on the Clara. The company left Santa Fe on the 31st of .July, and reached Independence on the 25th instant, thus making the trip in twentyfive days.
docs.snippet: FROM SANTA FE.--Several persons from the Plains arrived last night on the Clara. The company left Santa Fe on the 31st of .July, and reached Independence on the 25th instant, thus making the trip in twentyfive days.

docs.abstract: Letter of Stephen B. Mann agt
docs.snippet: Letter of Stephen B. Mann agt

docs.lead_paragraph: MACAULEY, the historian's health is so feeble that it is doubted if he will be able to take his seat in the new Parliament, to which he has been elected for Edinburgh. A letter from Warsaw of the 17th, says that the cholera, at present committing such ravages in the neighborhood of Kaliscb, arose from making some excavations in the cemetery of Leak, near Kalisch, where the victims of the cholera of 1832 were buried.

docs.lead_paragraph: From the Boston Courier, 10th. Mr. WEBSTER's health is improving. The refreshing breezes of the ocean have already had an improving effect upon him, and his catarrh is subsiding. He finds time to superintend the affairs of his great farm, to fish a little, shoot some besides attending to the business of the State Department which belongs to his duties. A few weeks in Marshfield will, no doubt, restore him to perfect health and strength.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; DEMOCRATIC CITY CONVENTION. THE HENRY CLVY. THE THIRTEENTH WARD CHIPPEWA CLUB ALBONI, TO-NIGHT. THE SERENADE. RESIGNATION. LAUNCH. PERSONAL. MAZEPPA ENGINE COMPANY AT ALBANY. ORDER OF GOOD FELLOWS. ATTEMPT 70 SHOOT AN OFFICER. KILLED BY A HOSE CART. A NEGRO CUT WITH A KNIFE. BOARD OF ASSISTANTS. BOARD OF EDUCATION CAVALRY PARADE. THE SESSIONS. RECOVERY OF STOLEN JEWELRY. RUN OVER AND INJURED. CHARGE OF MAIMING. ROBBING AN AUCTION STORE. ARREST OF A FUGITIVE. COURT CALENDAR SUPREME COURT SUPERIOR COURT. COMMON PLEAS
